articles.title: Bears looking past Arlington Heights for possible stadium sites, including Northwest Indiana - Chicago Sun-Times
articles.description: Gov. JB Pritzker called the team's latest shift in its stadium focus "a startling slap in the face."
articles.content:
The Bears sole focus for a new stadium is no longer Arlington Heights and no longer Illinois.
